account.welcomeAdvisory: You must be 18+ years old to register
account.completeProfileSubtitle: Choose a username and upload an avatar

onboarding.firstInstructionSubtitle: Choose your favorite sport, type of break, or breaker, and jump into a live event
onboarding.secondInstructionSubtitle: No more leaving a live stream to buy into your favorite break - a few clicks and you’re in!
onboarding.thridInstructionSubtitle: Reserve your spot in advance, or follow a break, and get notified when it’s live
onboarding.fourthInstructionSubtitle: We scan your biggest hits, you share and show them off right from your account
